title: (x) Alternate version of Futura Round but can't identify. Help! - Bryant {Tamas}
content:
Trying to ID this for a client. It looks really similar to Futura Round. Would really appreciate it if someone could shed some light on it, Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714182706/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_3.jpg) | 40.69 KB |
author: Abstrakt Creative

comments.content:
I think this is [Bryant Alt](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714182706/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/bryant/).

- Mike Yanega

Tamas, you beat me to it!

- Mike Yanega
